verses.name: Jeremiah 30:21
verses.text: And their nobles shall be of themselves, and their governor shall proceed from the midst of them; and I will cause him to draw near, and he shall approach unto me: for who is this that engaged his heart to approach unto me? saith the Lord.

verses.name: Jeremiah 30:22
verses.text: And ye shall be my people, and I will be your God.

verses.name: Jeremiah 30:23
verses.text: Behold, the whirlwind of the Lord goeth forth with fury, a continuing whirlwind: it shall fall with pain upon the head of the wicked.
